description: Chief Advisor to the Holy Raalgon Empress, Wang craves to be more than just the Premier. He places the blame of the Emperor`s death on the UPSF and craftily convinces Empress http://anidb.net/ch7032 [Azalyn] to declare war with them. Meanwhile, Wang continues to manipulate the Empire`s opinion against the Empress to force her to bend to his will. Hungry for the power of the throne, he makes several attempts on Azalyn`s life.
name: Naku Ra Wang
